summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5637 for the improvement of Hanford Street, from East Marginal Way to 1st Avenue South, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74351, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
